comparison.description: Determines how the amount of entities stored in the power will be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the amount of entities stored in the power will be compared to the specified value.

value.description: The specified value to compare the amount of entities stored in the power to.
value.markdownDescription: The specified value to compare the amount of entities stored in the power to.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](../entity_condition_types.md)

Compares the amount of entities stored in a power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/set_size) to a certain value.

Type ID: `origins:set_size`
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Condition Type](../entity_condition_types.md)

Compares the amount of entities stored in a power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/set_size) to a certain value.

Type ID: `origins:set_size`
